EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2017-11-22
EmailTemplate.subject: Accenture and Pivotal Launch New Business Unit Around Cloud Foundry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
November 22, 2017 <[[http://www.crn.com/news/cloud/300095561/crn-exclusive-accenture-and-pivotal-launch-new-business-unit-around-cloud-foundry.htm?itc=hp_ots&itc=refresh]]> Accenture and Pivotal Launch New Business Unit Around Cloud Foundry We're excited to announce that we've teamed up with Accenture to create a new business group dedicated to modernizing enterprise applications with Pivotal Cloud Foundry. Check it Out <[[http://www.crn.com/news/cloud/300095561/crn-exclusive-accenture-and-pivotal-launch-new-business-unit-around-cloud-foundry.htm?itc=hp_ots&itc=refresh]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/how-to-explain-your-tech-job-to-your-family-905a7c367e2a?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> How to Explain Your Tech Job to Your Family With the holidays coming up, we have a quick metaphor that might help you explain your tech job at the dinner table. Turkeys, Pies, and APIs <[[https://builttoadapt.io/how-to-explain-your-tech-job-to-your-family-905a7c367e2a?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/window-or-a-i-sle-8161864f07f6?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Window or A.I.sle? How artificial intelligence-powered apps are streamlining how we travel. The Transformation of Travel <[[https://builttoadapt.io/window-or-a-i-sle-8161864f07f6?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://2017.springoneplatform.io/ehome/s1p/registration?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/pivotal-cloud-foundry-and-cloud-native-security?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Pivotal Cloud Foundry and Cloud-Native Security What does cloud-native Security mean to Pivotal? Brian McClain explains. Read Now <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/pivotal-cloud-foundry-and-cloud-native-security?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[http://www.businessinsider.com/51-enterprise-startups-to-bet-your-career-on-in-2018-2017-11/#pivotal-helping-big-companies-do-what-google-does-51]]> 51 Enterprise Startups to Bet Your Career On In 2018 Business Insider has listed Pivotal as one of the 51 most promising enterprise startups to join. What Sets Us Apart <[[http://www.businessinsider.com/51-enterprise-startups-to-bet-your-career-on-in-2018-2017-11/#pivotal-helping-big-companies-do-what-google-does-51]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/zero-downtime-migration-between-gemfire-releases?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Zero Downtime Data Migration Between GemFire Clusters Using Apache Kafka How Pivotal accomplished the no down-time data transfer through data export-import and a publish-subscribe mechanism to continuously transfer changes between the clusters, using Apache Kafka and Spring Cloud Stream applications. Learn More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/zero-downtime-migration-between-gemfire-releases?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://www.pivotaltracker.com/blog/understanding-the-need-for-agile/]]> Understanding the Need for Agile Jeremy Jarrell explains the history of agile and why it's necessary. Deliver Great Products <[[https://www.pivotaltracker.com/blog/understanding-the-need-for-agile/]]> Upcoming Events 11/30 Greenplum Day, Singapore <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/greenplum-day-singapore-2017.html?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
11/30 Kubernetes the Simple Way, and Outcome-Based Roadmaps, Dublin <[[https://www.meetup.com/Pivotal-Dublin-Meetup/events/245102200/]]>
12/12 Internal Building Blocks - Aggregates, Entities, Value Objects, ... Part Three, Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/dec-12-internal-building-blocks-aggregates-entities-value-objects-part-three-webinar?utm_source=social&utm_medium=link&utm_campaign=ddd-part two-three--plod-q417]]>
12/13 Building a Big Data Fabric with a Next Generation Data Platform, Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/dec-13-building-a-big-data-fabric-with-a-next-generation-data-platform-webinar?utm_source=social&utm_medium=link&utm_campaign=big-data-fabric-q417]]>
